name: Peregrin
description: Peregrin is a story puzzle game. A solitary traveller undertakes a perilous voyage through the haunted ruins of a lost civilisation. Seeking to fulfil an ancient prophecy, she will have to use her arcane powers to solve puzzles and survive battles - if she is to find a way to restore the fallen world of Peregrin.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4600 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 860 Storage: 2 GB available space
